com.samskivert.depot

Class Transformer<F,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.depot.Transformer<F,T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Transformers.ByteEnumSet, Transformers.EnumIterable, Transformers.IntegerIterable, Transformers.StringArray, Transformers.StringIterable

    public abstract class Transformer<F,T>
extends Object
    Transforms a persistent record field into a format that can be read and written by the underlying database. For example, one might transform an enum into a byte, short or integer. Or one might transform a string array into a single string, using a separator known to be appropriate for the contents.
    See Also:
    Transformers

        public abstract T toPersistent(F value)
        Transforms a runtime value into a value that can be persisted.
        Parameters:
        value - the value just read from a persistent record.
        Returns:
        the transformed value, which will be written to the database.

      • fromPersistent

        public abstract F fromPersistent(T value)
        Transforms a persisted value into a value that can be store in a runtime field.
        Parameters:
        value - the value just read from the database.
        Returns:
        the transformed value, which will be stored in a field of the persistent record.
